decks.notes: The deck focuses on controlling the game through a combination of powerful Eldrazi creatures and the Urza lands to quickly generate mana. Karn, the Great Creator serves as a versatile threat while also shutting down opponent's artifacts. The deck aims to disrupt the opponent's strategy with Thought-Knot Seer and Glaring Fleshraker, while also presenting a fast clock with the Eldrazi creatures like Ulamog, the Ceaseless Hunger. Ugin, the Spirit Dragon provides additional board control and finisher potential. The deck aims to outvalue and outlast opponents through a combination of disruption and powerful threats.

The main idea behind this deck is to utilize Allosaurus Rider in combination with Nourishing Shoal and either Griselbrand or Ghalta, Stampede Tyrant to quickly assemble a powerful creature on the battlefield. The deck also includes various ways to search for the necessary cards, protect the combo with Pact of Negation, and generate additional value with cards like Neoform and Eldritch Evolution. The inclusion of cards like Veil of Summer and Endurance helps to protect the combo from disruption, while cards like Planar Genesis and Consign to Memory provide additional win conditions.

This deck focuses on playing aggressively, utilizing a mix of 4 or 5 different colored cards to overwhelm opponents. The key strategy involves playing Leyline of the Guildpact to strengthen your board presence, along with cards like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Lightning Bolt for quick damage. Scion of Draco provides a powerful creature to control the board, while cards like Territorial Kavu and Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury help maintain pressure. Consign to Memory and Stubborn Denial offer disruption and protection, allowing you to secure victories efficiently and effectively.

This Boros Aggro deck focuses on quick and aggressive plays to overwhelm the opponent. It utilizes cards like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Guide of Souls to put pressure on the opponent early on, while also using cards like Seasoned Pyromancer and Ajani, Nacatl Pariah for additional value and card advantage. The deck also has some control elements with cards like Goblin Bombardment and Static Prison to disrupt the opponent's strategy. Overall, the key concept of this deck is to maintain a fast pace and apply constant pressure to secure a quick victory.

The key concept of this Boros Aggro deck is to overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures such as Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Guide of Souls, backed up by burn spells like Galvanic Discharge and Goblin Bombardment. Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury acts as a finisher, while Ajani, Nacatl Pariah provides support and buffs for the team. The deck also utilizes disruption with cards like Blood Moon and Elegant Parlor, and has mana fixing with fetch lands like Windswept Heath and Arid Mesa. The overall strategy is to quickly build a strong board presence and close out the game swiftly.

The key concept of this deck is to assemble a quick and efficient combo using cards like Ruby Medallion, Pyretic Ritual, and Desperate Ritual to generate mana and cast spells like Ral, Monsoon Mage, and Past in Flames to create a storm of spells and burn spells like Grapeshot to finish off the opponent. The deck aims to use cards like Wrenn's Resolve and Ral, Monsoon Mage to consistently draw through the deck, finding the necessary pieces to execute the combo and win the game quickly. It is a highly explosive and proactive deck that relies on speed and synergy to overwhelm the opponent.

The main concept of the deck is to control the game by using the powerful UrzaTron lands to ramp up mana quickly and play high-cost Eldrazi creatures. Cards like Karn, the Great Creator and Thought-Knot Seer help disrupt the opponent's strategy, while Ugin, the Eye of the Storms provides additional removal and threats. The deck aims to dominate the late game by playing big threats like Ulamog, the Ceaseless Hunger and overwhelming the opponent with its powerful Eldrazi creatures.

This deck aims to control the game by utilizing the UrzaTron lands (Urza's Mine, Power Plant, and Tower) to quickly ramp up mana and play powerful threats such as Thought-Knot Seer, Karn, the Great Creator, and Ugin, the Eye of the Storms. The deck also includes powerful Eldrazi creatures like Ulamog, the Ceaseless Hunger and Devourer of Destiny to pressure the opponent. In addition, cards like Kozilek's Command and Sowing Mycospawn provide disruption and card advantage. The inclusion of Talismans and Expedition Map help ensure consistent mana production and access to key pieces.

This Dimir Control deck focuses on disrupting the opponent's strategy through a combination of counterspells, hand disruption with cards like Thoughtseize, and removal spells like Fatal Push. The deck also utilizes creatures like Psychic Frog and Orcish Bowmasters to control the board and generate value. Tamiyo, Inquisitive Student and Quantum Riddler provide card advantage and selection, while cards like Cling to Dust and Shoot the Sheriff offer graveyard hate. The deck aims to out value and out control the opponent to secure a victory.

This deck focuses on rapidly putting pressure on the opponent by playing aggressive creatures and using powerful spells to disrupt their strategy. It combines different colors for versatility and includes cards that can control the board or provide card advantage. The inclusion of powerful creatures like Omnath, Locus of Creation and Elesh Norn, Mother of Machines, alongside disruptive spells like Leyline Binding and Force of Negation, allows the deck to quickly overwhelm the opponent and secure victory. Additionally, some cards like Quantum Riddler and Shardless Agent provide additional value and card advantage.

The main focus of this deck is to control the game by utilizing powerful Eldrazi creatures and the UrzaTron lands to generate massive amounts of mana. This allows the player to cast big threats like Emrakul, the Promised End and Karn, the Great Creator, while also disrupting the opponent's game plan with Thought-Knot Seer and Dismember. The deck is designed to outvalue opponents with its high impact threats and efficient removal, ultimately overwhelming them with its powerful late game plays.

The deck focuses on aggressive plays using low-cost creatures like Ragavan and Ocelot Pride to quickly overwhelm the opponent. It also includes various burn spells like Galvanic Discharge and Goblin Bombardment to deal direct damage and control the board. The addition of Ajani and Voice of Victory provides support for the creatures and adds to the overall aggressive strategy. The mana base is designed to support the quick tempo of the deck with fetch lands and dual lands. Overall, the deck aims to consistently apply pressure and finish off the opponent before they can stabilize.

This Bant Aggro deck focuses on aggressive creatures and efficient spells to put pressure on the opponent quickly. It combines powerful cards like Teferi, Time Raveler and Elesh Norn, Mother of Machines with versatile creatures like Coiling Oracle and Ice-Fang Coatl. The deck also includes a mix of removal spells and card draw to help maintain tempo and disrupt the opponent's strategy. Overall, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with its diverse threats and disruptive elements to secure a quick victory.

The main concept of this Rakdos Aggro deck is to overwhelm the opponent with fast and aggressive creatures, utilizing pump spells like Brute Force and Mutagenic Growth to deal quick, impactful damage. Leyline of Resonance helps power up the deck early on, while cards like Monstrous Rage and Turn Inside Out add additional damage output. The deck also includes cards like Callous Sell-Sword and Slickshot Show-Off for additional utility and removal options. The goal is to establish board presence quickly and finish off the opponent in a swift and aggressive manner.

This deck focuses on generating as much mana as quickly as possible to play powerful cards like Primeval Titan and Urza's Saga. The key strategy is to use Amulet of Vigor and bounce lands like Simic Growth Chamber to ramp up quickly and tutor for key pieces with cards like Green Sun's Zenith. The goal is to quickly assemble a powerful board state with multiple land drops per turn, eventually overwhelming the opponent with a massive army of powerful creatures and lands.

This Boros Aggro deck focuses on using aggressive creatures like Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury, Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer, and Guide of Souls to quickly deal damage to the opponent. It also includes cards like Goblin Bombardment and Arena of Glory to provide additional damage and control options. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with a combination of efficient creatures, burn spells like Galvanic Discharge, and disruption from cards like Mana Tithe and Voice of Victory. Additionally, cards like Ajani, Nacatl Pariah and Thraben Charm provide additional utility and flexibility to handle various situations.
